definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: There were 18 inhalational allergens in allergen steep.
sentences.chinese: 變應原浸液內含18種常見吸入性過敏原。

sentences.english: MSG is a major trigger for me.
sentences.chinese: 味精對我而言是一個主要的過敏原。

sentences.english: Moderate exposure [to allergens] will prime the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 適當地接觸過敏原將會完善免疫系統。

sentences.english: Methods To detect the allergens of eczema with Intracutaneous Test.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用變應原皮內試驗方法檢測溼疹患者過敏原。

sentences.english: For instance, some people must eliminate allergens or have enlarged adenoids removed.
sentences.chinese: 例如，有些人必須消除過敏原或擴大腺樣刪除。

sentences.english: These come from their dried saliva and skin flakes that they shed.
sentences.chinese: 他們乾燥的唾液和皮膚脫落的皮屑都是過敏原。

sentences.english: Frequent steam cleaning helps remove allergens hiding in carpets.
sentences.chinese: 經常用水沖洗地毯有助於清出藏在地毯中的過敏原。

sentences.english: Hay fever is caused by outdoor allergens.
sentences.chinese: 花粉症是由戶外過敏原。

sentences.english: Other causes include organisms such as dust mites and molds .
sentences.chinese: 其它的過敏原包括諸如塵蟎和黴菌的生物。

definition: (TCM) pulse feeling and palpitation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
